channel.title: story on Mi chiamo San
channel.description: Recent content in story on Mi chiamo San

item.title: Italy
item.description: Italy was a pure accident. After having spent a good number of years working in the corporate space with some amazing minds, I had a strong sense of wanting to learn more and improve in some emerging areas such as machine learning. Before leaving a lucrative career, I wanted to be sure that my next jump would help me complete the objective of having a holistic understanding of technology and the underlying mathematics of these algorithms, frameworks, and methodologies.
